Text.text: Still harping on about mushroom magic are we? Isn't it time you stopped talking shiitake, Agaricus?
Text.speaker: ANDREAEA

Text.text: What would you know about magic, you mossy witch? Bog off why don't you. I'm busy.
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: You're wasting your time. My magical moss garden knocks the spores off your sad little fungus cave. Admit it. You can't possibly compete with me.
Text.speaker: ANDREAEA

Text.text: I shall admit nothing of the sort! You're full of loam, interfering old bat. We'll see who wins the spore war.
Text.speaker: AGARICUS
